    Guides

    Practical guides for using and contributing to cache-kit.

    Available Guides

    1. Examples & Patterns - Advanced usage patterns and real-world scenarios
    2. Testing Guide - Testing strategies, Makefile commands, and CI/CD integration
    3. Performance Guide - Benchmarking, optimization, and production tuning
    4. Production Troubleshooting - Diagnose and resolve common cache-kit issues with error handling best practices
    5. Monitoring & Metrics - Set up observability, metrics, and alerting
    6. Contributing Guide - Code standards, testing requirements, and submission process

    Quick Start

    If youâ€™re new to cache-kit, start with the Contributing Guide to understand the project structure and development workflow.

    For advanced usage patterns and real-world examples, see the Examples & Patterns guide.

    To run tests and validate your changes, refer to the Testing Guide.
